page.title: 07Home Life-Sunday
page.content: {A typical Sunday-North Preston. On Sunday morning MrYoung gets up at 8.30 and cooks breakfast for both himself and his wife.Having taken breakfast in bed Mr and Mrs Young get dressed at about 10.00.If the weather is{fine,Mr Young will do some {gardening}while his wife prepares the Sunday dinner.Immediately before lunch Rosie(having got up at about 10.30) revises for her"O"levels.Lunch is taken at 1.00. In the afternoon the family may go for a walk-possibly to the{Preston {Recreation Ground}where cricket is played on most Sundays.Tea at 4.00 p.m is followed by{a cold supper at 7.00. Mr Young and Rosie then retire to watch T.V while Mrs Young washes up and prepares clean clothing for the morning.The{family finally go to bed {at about 11.00.
